views.markdown:
This item is now Free.

Compatible with iOS 7 - 12





Keyshortcut Pro allows you to use smart shortcuts for a better typing experience on your iOS device

KeyShortcut Pro allows you to use variety of shortcuts, everything from selecting all with a tiny longhold on shortcut key to profiles to insert text. Below can you see which type of shortcuts you can use.

Select all
Copy
Cut
Paste
Undo
Redo
Select last word
Beginning of document
End of document
Capitalize last word
Last word to upper
Last word to lower
Delete last word
Dismiss keyboard


In additions to action shortcuts you can also customize profiles for keys below:
1
2
3
4
5
6
7
8
9
0
@
SpaceKeyShortcut Pro is compatible with iOS 6 > iOS 8.4, if you have any issues please don't hesitate to contact the developer via the contact form above

Configure options from Settings.

(If more crashes occur, it is probably not a KeyShortcut issue. But I am open for reliable and logical issue reports)
+ Fixed header on pref pane for iPads

+ Fixed bug where shortcuts would not work if app enters background then foreground again

+ New preference pane (If you encounter any issues, please contact the developer)

+ (EXPERIMENTAL) Smart Shift
Added remote clipboard
* Check Github for more information

Fixed global keyboard switching
Fixed keyboard lag
Fix bug where the key would not be dismissed if not bound to an action

Added capitalize last word
Added delete last word
Added dismiss keyboard

Last word to lowercase function

Fixes select last word, beginning of docuemnt and end of document functions

Fixes Safari crash
